firebase.auth/claims-too-large: The claims payload supplied to setCustomUserClaims () exceeds the maximum allowable size of 1000 bytes.
firebase.auth/email-already-exists: The email provided is already in use by an existing user. Each user must have a unique email.
firebase.auth/email-already-in-use: Mail already in use by another user
firebase.auth/id-token-expired: The provided Firebase ID token has expired.
firebase.auth/id-token-revoked: The Firebase ID token has been revoked.
firebase.auth/invalid-argument: An invalid argument was supplied to an authentication method. The error message should contain additional information.
firebase.auth/invalid-claims: Custom claim attributes supplied to setCustomUserClaims () are not valid.
firebase.auth/invalid-continue-uri: The pursuit URL must be a valid URL string.
firebase.auth/invalid-creation-time: Creation time must be a valid UTC date string.
firebase.auth/invalid-disabled-field: The value provided for the user disabled property is not valid. It must be a boolean.
firebase.auth/invalid-display-name: The value provided for the displayName user property is not valid. It must be a non-empty string.
firebase.auth/invalid-dynamic-link-domain: The dynamic link domain provided is not configured or authorized for the current project.
firebase.auth/invalid-email: The value provided for the email user property is not valid. It must be a string type email address.
firebase.auth/invalid-email-verified: The value provided for the emailVerified user property is not valid. It must be a boolean.
firebase.auth/invalid-hash-algorithm: The hash algorithm must match one of the strings in the list of supported algorithms.
firebase.auth/invalid-hash-block-size: The size of the hash block must be a valid number.
firebase.auth/invalid-hash-derived-key-length: The length of the hash-derived key must be a valid number.
firebase.auth/invalid-hash-key: The hash key must be a valid byte buffer.
firebase.auth/invalid-hash-memory-cost: The cost of the hash memory must be a valid number.
firebase.auth/invalid-hash-parallelization: Hash parallelization must be a valid number.
firebase.auth/invalid-hash-rounds: Hash rounds must be a valid number.
firebase.auth/invalid-hash-salt-separator: The hash algorithm salt separator field must be a valid byte buffer.
firebase.auth/invalid-id-token: The provided ID token is not a valid Firebase ID token.
firebase.auth/invalid-last-sign-in-time: The last connection time must be a valid UTC date string.
firebase.auth/invalid-page-token: The next page token supplied in listUsers () is not valid. It must be a valid invalid string.
firebase.auth/invalid-password: The value provided for the user property of password is not valid. It must be a string of at least six characters.
firebase.auth/invalid-password-hash: The hash of the password must be a valid byte buffer.
firebase.auth/invalid-password-salt: Password salt must be a valid byte buffer
firebase.auth/invalid-phone-number: The value provided for phoneNumber is not valid. This must be a non-empty E.164 compliant identifier string.
firebase.auth/invalid-photo-url: The value provided for the photoURL user property is not valid. It must be a string URL.
firebase.auth/invalid-provider-data: The providerData must be a valid array of UserInfo objects.
firebase.auth/invalid-provider-id: The providerId must be a valid supported provider identifier string.
firebase.auth/invalid-session-cookie-duration: The duration of the session cookie must be a valid number in milliseconds between 5 minutes and 2 weeks.
firebase.auth/invalid-uid: The supplied uid must be a non-empty string of up to 128 characters.
firebase.auth/invalid-user-import: The user record to be imported is not valid.
firebase.auth/maximum-user-count-exceeded: The maximum number of users allowed to import has been exceeded.
firebase.auth/missing-android-pkg-name: An Android package name must be provided if the Android app is to be installed.
firebase.auth/missing-continue-uri: A valid pursuit URL must be provided in the request.
firebase.auth/missing-hash-algorithm: Importing users with password hashes requires that the hash algorithm and its parameters are supplied.
firebase.auth/missing-ios-bundle-id: An iOS bundle ID is missing from the request.
firebase.auth/missing-uid: An uid identifier is required for the current operation.
firebase.auth/operation-not-allowed: The provided connection provider is disabled for your Firebase project. Enable it in the Connection method section of the Firebase console.
firebase.auth/phone-number-already-exists: The supplied phoneNumber is already in use by an existing user. Each user must have a unique phoneNumber.
firebase.auth/requires-recent-login: This type of data is sensitive, please login again
firebase.auth/reserved-claims: One or more custom user claims provided to setCustomUserClaims() are reserved. For example, OIDC specific claims such as (sub, iat, iss, exp, aud, auth_time, etc.) should not be used as keys for custom claims.
firebase.auth/session-cookie-expired: The provided Firebase session cookie has expired.
firebase.auth/session-cookie-revoked: The Firebase session cookie has been revoked.
firebase.auth/uid-already-exists: The supplied uid is already in use by an existing user. Each user must have a unique uid.
firebase.auth/unauthorized-continue-uri: The domain of the pursuit URL is not whitelisted. Add the domain to the whitelist in the Firebase console.
firebase.auth/user-not-found: There is no user record matching the username provided
